# Templates & AI Checklist

## 10.1 Template Gallery

- [ ] Gallery loads all templates
- [ ] Category filtering works
- [ ] Difficulty filtering works
- [ ] Search by name works
- [ ] Search by description works
- [ ] Template preview shows stages

---

## 10.2 Template Instantiation

- [ ] Basic template creates pipeline
- [ ] Template variables replaced correctly
- [ ] Template stages configured correctly
- [ ] Instantiated pipeline executes successfully
- [ ] Custom name for new pipeline works
- [ ] Duplicate name handling works

---

## 10.3 AI Pipeline Generation

### Generation
- [ ] Simple prompt generates pipeline
- [ ] Complex prompt with multiple stages works
- [ ] Generated pipeline is valid JSON
- [ ] Generated pipeline can be saved
- [ ] Generated pipeline executes

### Iteration
- [ ] Iterate/regenerate refines output
- [ ] Example prompts work correctly

---

## 10.4 Copilot Features

- [ ] Stage suggestions are relevant
- [ ] Explain pipeline output is helpful
- [ ] Debug error analysis works
- [ ] Optimize suggestions provided
- [ ] Natural language queries work

---
